verses.verse: In the year <WH8141> that Tartan <WH8661> came <WH935> <WH8800> unto Ashdod <WH795>, (when Sargon <WH5623> the king <WH4428> of Ashur <WH804> sent <WH7971> <WH8800> him,) and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against Ashdod <WH795>, and took <WH3920> <WH8799> it;

At the same time <WH6256> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> the YY <WH3068> by <WH3027> Yesha`yah-yahu <WH3470> the son <WH1121> of Amoz <WH531>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> and loose <WH6605> <WH8765> the sackcloth <WH8242> from off thy loins <WH4975>, and put off <WH2502> <WH8799> thy shoe <WH5275> from thy foot <WH7272>. And he did so <WH6213> <WH8799>, walking <WH1980> <WH8800> naked <WH6174> and barefoot <WH3182>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Like as my servant <WH5650> Yesha`yah-yahu <WH3470> hath walked <WH1980> <WH8804> naked <WH6174> and barefoot <WH3182> three <WH7969> years <WH8141> for a sign <WH226> and wonder <WH4159> upon Egypt <WH4714> and upon Ethiopia <WH3568>;

So shall the king <WH4428> of Ashur <WH804> lead away <WH5090> <WH8799> the Egyptians <WH4714> prisoners <WH7628>, and the Ethiopians <WH3568> captives <WH1546>, young <WH5288> and old <WH2205>, naked <WH6174> and barefoot <WH3182>, even with their buttocks <WH8357> uncovered <WH2834> <WH8803>, to the shame <WH6172> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And they shall be afraid <WH2865> <WH8804> and ashamed <WH954> <WH8804> of Ethiopia <WH3568> their expectation <WH4007>, and of Egypt <WH4714> their glory <WH8597>.

And the inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802> of this isle <WH339> shall say <WH559> <WH8804> in that day <WH3117>, Behold, such <WH3541> is our expectation <WH4007>, whither we flee <WH5127> <WH8804> for help <WH5833> to be delivered <WH5337> <WH8736> from <WH6440> the king <WH4428> of Ashur <WH804>: and how shall we escape <WH4422> <WH8735> ?
